Feline Institute for Boredom Remediation

We provide evidence-based treatment for chronic ennui, one paw at a time.

Our research clinics measure whisker twitch variability, sofa-stare duration, and afternoon yawn clusters to restore meaningful curiosity in humans and companion cats.

FIBR advances boredom medicine as a public health service. We fund trials, train volunteers, and provide no-cost boredom triage in under-resourced neighborhoods where attention drift has gone untreated for generations.
